description: Security: GCP Audit - Looks for GCP actions that, while not inherently suspicious or abnormal, are sourcing from a user context that does not normally call the method. This can be the result of compromised credentials or keys as someone uses a valid account to persist, move laterally, or exfil data.

detectors.detector_description: Detects rare GCP Audit event actions for a user.

custom_settings.security_app_display_name: Unusual User for a GCP Audit action
